Title: Japan’s MOL to invest in Delfin Midstream, accelerating FID on first two Delfin FLNG vessels
Description: Japanese shipper Mitsui OSK Lines has agreed to make a strategic investment in US floating LNG project developer Delfin Midstream, with the investment expected to “accelerate” a final investment decision this year on two of the four FLNG vessels for the Delfin LNG project in the Gulf of Mexico.
Author: CK

Title: TTF gains sideline some Asian LNG buyers as offers rise, while others look to lock in prices
Description: Gains in the Dutch TTF gas hub price have led to higher Asian LNG offers this week, scaring away some Asian buyers that were looking to take advantage of a further drop in Asian LNG prices last week to stock up on cargoes amid searing heat in some parts of the region.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks LNG cargoes for nine July to December import slots
Description: Thailand’s state-owned energy firm PTT is seeking cargoes to fill nine slots for delivery to the 11.5 mtpa Map Ta Phut LNG receiving terminal in Rayong between July and December amid a rise in prompt prices this week. The tender closes on June 14.
Author: CK
